calendar_id.description: Google Calendar ID. The format should follow {user_name}@{domain}.
calendar_id.title: Calendar Id

send_updates.description:
Whether to send notifications about the creation of the new event. Note that some emails might still be sent. 
The default is none.
Acceptable values are:
- all: Notifications are sent to all guests.
- externalOnly: Notifications are sent to non-Google Calendar guests only.
- none: No notifications are sent.
send_updates.title: Send Updates
